solution_list.title: Rudder
solution_list.description: Rudder is an easy to use, web-driven, role-based solution for IT Infrastructure Automation & Compliance. Rudder is designed for critical environments where a security breach can mean more than a blip in the sales stats. Built-in features include change requests, audit logs, and strong authentication.

success_case_list.title: Configuration and package management for an industrial company
success_case_list.description: An automative industrial company needed to select and implement a new solution for configuration and package management. The aim was to standardize the worldwide UNIX/Linux infrastructure and ensure compliance with security and IT policies.

success_case_list.title: Jaguar Networks selects Rudder for the Continuous configuration management of its Stand-alone Servers
success_case_list.description: Jaguar Network had four main goals to improve the quality of their service: the centralization and automation of platform management,the maintenance of internal quality standards over time, having visibility on server compliance and finally obtaining security qualifications such as SecNumCloud, GDPR, PCI-DSS,etc.
